page.title: 12MY SCHOOL DAY
page.content: {BY TIMOTHY HESSEL AGED 8 YEARS IN THE MORNING I GET PICKED UP BY THE MINIBUS AT TEN PAST EIGHT, THEN WE GO FOR ASSEMBLY AND THEN WE DO MATHS. AFTER THAT IT IS PLAY-TIME. AFTER PLAY WE DO ENGLISH AND THEN WE HAVE OUR DINNER, AND I LIKE COLESLAW,CHEESE FLAN AND CHIPS. WHEN WE HAVE FINISHED WE GO OUTSIDE, AND THEN WE HAVE TOPIC WORK AND ART, AND THEN IT IS PLAYTIME AGAIN. AFTER PLAY WE SING OR HAVE A STORY, THEN IT IS TIME TO GO HOME AND WE GET OUR COATS ON. THEN WE GET ON THE BUS. SCHOOL FINISHES AT 3.15 PM AND I GET HOME AT 3.25 PM. ON WEDNESDAY WE GO TO PRUDHOE SWIMMING BATHS FOR A SWIMMING LESSON AND WE OFTEN JOIN OTHER SCHOOLS FOR THEATRE VISITS AND GAMES.
